data.text: Halli niruk suoa Jisu'n Peter le anaipa James halli John, ama'n aruoiya inmani bit omnasik ching insaang inkhat khan aleisipui.
Inmani'n khan inhei enlai, Jisu inmani maikuungnga ameelsuo hong inthuul jei: ama meel kha kani angnga aleiwar, halli ama puondiar ngaikha war angnga aleichek.
Halli siamruoi inthum ngai'n Moses khat-um Elijah Jisu le inruoiya thurchi inril inleimu.
Khawa jarra Peter in Jisu diang ati, “Pumi, eini'n hinna ni-om hichu angtuk kahoi me! nang in nazoot inchu, kei'n riakbuk inthum sakkate, nang sik inkhat, Moses sik inkhat, halli Elijah sik inkhat.”

Ama'n aril laichei khan, enru, akawar sumphai'n inmani aleimakhu, halli sumphaiya inphut rasa inkhat in ajuoti, “Hiwa hi kiminriang tak kasapa kha eii, ama chungnga kamalung atai; nangni ama iti rangairu!” Inphut 22:2; Minpkla 2:7; Isa 42:1; Matt 3:17; 12:18; Mk 1:11; Luk 3:22; Innidan 18:15
Siamruoi ngaikhan rasa kha injetpha, inmani inleichithei, halli neipilchungnga inmani inmeel inkuunna inlei inbok.
Jisu'n inkoolla aheiwa ah akatook ah ati, “Intheiru, chimaru!”
Halli inmani'n inhong enpha Jisu eleiya tu inkhat bit um khawakhan leimumujei.

Inmani'n khan chingnga inphut injuo chumpha, Jisu'n inmani diang, “Miring Sapa in thiya inphut ahongring maklaiseng, tu inkhat diang um nangni'n ning imu ngaikha rilsuok maru tia inmani diang chong aleipeii.”
Halli siamruoi ngai'n Jisu diang inleirakel, “Angsikme sina Dan ocha ngai'n Elijah ajuo masasik eii inti?” Mal 4:5
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Inthiangnga Elijah juomasata,” “halli angrakip hi alaminsuuk wiaksik eii.

Takkha kei'n nangni diang kati khachu Elijah kha ajuosuojei takkha mi ngai'n ama leijetmu, takkha inmani'n inmanuom kha ama chungnga inleitho. Khawale in-angrip ah Miring Sapa kha um inmani'n inminpoong nooksik eii.” Matt 11:14
Khawa phakhan ama'n John Baptist jarra iril eii ti asiamruoi ngai'n inleijet.
Inmani'n mipui ngaidiang injuokir pha, miring inkhat Jisu diang aheiwa, halli amaikuungnga chubei ajuotho,
halli ati, “Ocha, kasapa hi naminriang piro! Ama hi rikeiri araweiya apoongthei jei ajarchu ama tuisuung meisuungnga aluut kachak jei.
Kei'n nasiamruoi ngaidiang kaleiruoi, takkha inmani'n namindampi matormu.”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “E ngamna kasiin le mi kathamak ngai! Angtuk kasootme kei nangni le kalaom suomsik hi? Kei'n nangni le angtuk kasoot kanaladeipui sikme? Naipangpa kha hin kakoolla heiruoi ro!”
Jisu'n ratha kathamak diang khan chong aleipeii, halli ratha kathamak kha naipangpa diangnga inphut aleisuok, khawa phachei khan naipangpa kha adamjei.
Halli siamruoi ngai'n ruuk ah Jisu diang inheiwa ah inleirakel, “Angjarra keini'n ratha kathamak kha kinpuutsuok matormakme?”

“Ajarchu ning inngamna kha asiin thei,” tia Jisu'n aleimasang. “Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kati khachu anchamru tiatbit kalok inngamna ningnei inchu, nangni'n hiwa ching diang tiningte, ‘hiwa hinna inphut soson inthonro!’ halli khawa khan inthonsik eii. Halli nangni thomatormak sik iteii omnuni!” 17:20. Manuscript lekkhat in alam 21 inthundel:Takkha bungeile inruoiya Pathian nina khan bit hiwa rakip hi apuut mator; iteii khat innum matormak (Mk 9:29 khan enru)  Matt 21:21; Mk 11:23; 1 Cor 13:2
Siamruoi rakip in Galilee khan injuo inchunwiak phakhan, Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Miring Sapa kha mi ngai kutchungnga inlapesuok sik eii
halli inmani'n ama kha inlathatsik eii; takkha nithum huuini ama ahongringsik eii.”
Jisu le asiamruoi ngai'n Capernaum inheitung pha, nina inna sialkakhompa in Peter diang aheiwa ah aleiti, “Nangni ning ochapa'n Biak-inna pesik kasuok sial kha pemak abe?” Suok 30:13; 38:26
“Oh apeii,” tia Peter in aleimasang.
“Mi leiilak ngai'n,” tia Peter in aleimasang.

Takkha eini'n hiwa mi ngaihi minpoong zootmakmi, khawa jarra siro tuidiil khan ngakhuoi jokeiro, halli ma-insakhet ah nisur ngabai khan sial lei omte, Kha lei inlang kei sik le nang sik inmani diang pero” ati.
